name: OpenEEW Logo in Nav Bar
format:
<script id="logoscript" type="text/javascript">
    $(function () {
        //add logo
        var div1 = $('<div/>');
        var logo = new Image();
 logo.src = " data:image/png;base64," 
        logo.height = 45;
        div1[0].style.margin = 'auto 10px auto auto';

        div1.append(logo);

        function addToToolbar() {
            var toolbar = $('.md-toolbar-tools');
            
            if(!toolbar.length) return;
            
            toolbar.append(div1);
        }
        addToToolbar();
    });
</script>

name: OpenEEW Logo

info:
The Flutter mobile app sends the MAC address in lowercase.  Use JSONata to uppercase the _id
so that the Cloudant search by _id finds the
correct match.
